sentences.english: My sincere congratulations on this auspicious event of yours.
sentences.chinese: 值你倆大喜之日，謹致最誠摯的祝賀。

sentences.english: So, once again, my best wishes to the College at the start of another academic year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，再一次在新學年向學院致以我最誠摯的祝願。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Dongtang, the chairman, cordial welcome personalities from all walks of life to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 董事長楊東堂先生誠摯歡迎各界人士蒞臨導。

sentences.english: Doris Leuthard, president of the Confederation of the Federal Council of Switzerland, sent sincere condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士聯邦主席洛伊特哈德向中國人民表示誠摯慰問。

sentences.english: By all accounts the meetings are warm and cordial.
sentences.chinese: 這些談判不論怎麼說都是熱烈和誠摯的。

sentences.english: Usually they are calm and sincere.
sentences.chinese: 他們通常心如止水，誠摯懇切。

sentences.english: The publishers' statement expressed 'sincere apologies' to readers and to Mr. Tang.
sentences.chinese: 出版社的聲明向讀者和唐駿表示誠摯歉意。

sentences.english: And also he close the interview also by very warm handshake and also a  genuine thank-you.
sentences.chinese: 面試結束，他也會和麪試官握手，並且誠摯地道謝。

sentences.english: First of all, a warm welcome to cour company.
sentences.chinese: 首先，誠摯地歡迎你加入我們公司。

sentences.english: We offer you our sincerest wishes for a very enjoyable Mother's Day.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠摯地祝福您母親節愉快。

sentences.english: With all my sincerity, I would like to offer my thanks on this special day.
sentences.chinese: 在今天這個特殊的節日裏，我誠摯的向大家表示感謝。

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere wishes for the New Year.I hope you will continue to enjoy good health.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我誠摯的新年祝福，順祝身體健康。

sentences.english: When you answer the phone, be warm and enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 接聽電話時，應該誠摯而熱情。

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere wishes for the New Year and may your happy future be a most successful one.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我最誠摯的新年祝福，祝願您前程似錦。

sentences.english: The heart thright away from me truly loves never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 誠摯戀愛過的心永不忘懷。

sentences.english: Pleottom tolerhmarketing my sincere wishes for the New Year. I hope youwillcontinue to enjoy good heingternativeh.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我誠摯的新年祝願，順祝身體康健。

definition: to pull open/to pull apart/to space out/to increase
to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
to be concerned about/to care about
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
(formal) to honor with one's presence/to attend
(of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
